definition: to pat/to clap/to slap/to swat/to take (a photo)/to shoot (a film)/racket (sports)/beat (music)

sentences.english: At present, "striking bricks" is a popular expression on the Internet.
sentences.chinese: 如今，“拍磚”一詞在網上十分流行。

sentences.english: Welcome to explore, accept the challenge.
As a result some people get annoyed, and the flaming and trolling begin.
sentences.chinese: 於是有些人就惱了，挖坑和拍磚就開始了。
